title: Unable to Log in
body: Whenever I open my LoL client its all blank with nothing on it so no champion rotation, no news, nothing, I can however press the launch button and get in to the log in screen. When I type in my account password and username a Login error appears and I'm unable to do anything. Is this an error? cause my game was working perfectly yesterday. Please help.

replies.body:
Yep same problem here i tried every option is suggested, repaired lol 3 times and re-installed it. Dont bother doing anything nothing works im currently doing a system restore ill let you know if it fixes it. Also i believe it has something to do with IE.

Did a system restore for a week ago did not fix it, seems like nothing works.
I got exactly the same problem and I took the whole morning trying to fix it, but I am still unable to make a difference.
